title: Someone knows what the font is?
author: Gustavo_Cidral

comments.content:
Old standby Impact (Bold), with a bit of vertical adjustment:  
 [http://www.fonts.com/font/urw/urw-impact/bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20141005160442/http:/www.fonts.com/font/urw/urw-impact/bold "http://www.fonts.com/font/urw/urw-impact/bold")
